author: djrtwo
content:
**Announcing KintsugiğŸµ -- the November Merge sprint!**

This is the Kintsgui Meta-spec which enumerates the spec targets for the month:
https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/kintsugi-spec 

And here you can find the Merge development milestones we're targeting this month:
https://notes.ethereum.org/@djrtwo/kintsugi-milestones

As with Amphora, please update the table as you complete various milestones ğŸ™ 

As teams become ready, each Thursday we'll build a devnet with an aim to release a persistent testnet during the first week of December!

Additionally, the first 30 minutes of each EL and CL public call this month will be dedicated to team updates, issue/blocker discussions, and next steps for Kintsugi. We invite teams from both EL and CL to each, with the first being this week's CL call on Thursday, 2pm UTC

Thank you to everyone who worked so diligently on the spec updates since Amphora ğŸ¦¾ 

We're super excited for all the fun this month ğŸ™Œ
